p: Among the studied HIV-1, A (A6) subtype specific to Russia was detected in 57.2% and CRF63_02A1 in 12.6%; CRF02_AG СА was genetically similar to HIV-1 circulating in Central Asia in 0.6%. HIV-1 URFs were detected in 29.6% of the cases, including URF63/А (23.9%), URFА/В (4.4%), and URF02/А (1.3%).
